thread.title: Jerell Lambert
thread.title_full: MHW Bike-House GmbH bewertet von Jerell Lambert

author: Jerell Lambert
title: Jerell Lambert
text:
I'm in the U.S. and chose to purchase a German manufacture's e-mtb (Cube) from this great online German retailer due to the availability of the new model year bike and the very fair pricing (including intl. shipping) I was Quote: d.
Marian Verkhauf handled the sale and was very hands-on and available during the purchase and intl. shipping process which for an e-bike can have various hurdles due to the battery.
After I received the bike, MHW discovered that Cube's assemblers had put on the incorrect fork (27.5 instead of 27.5+) on this initial batch of this 2017 model.
Robert Hofer of MHW emailed me right away and we began the process of alerting CUBE, getting the proper fork to MHW and then on to me in the U.S. Robert was a joy to work with - he continuously kept me informed and we emailed back and forth regularly to keep each other informed on where things were in the intl. fork exchange.
I was recouped for all out-of-pocket costs (my mechanic's labor swapping the forks, etc.). I also requested that CUBE provide a useful form of compensation for their error and Robert worked it out so I received a Bosch quick charger for my trouble.
All-in-all, although being kept off my new bike while things got sorted out, my experience with MHW has been a really positive one, and I was so thankful for the superior customer service I received. When thanking Robert for all his help, his response was: "No thanks is necessary - that's service!"
